main event: An unidentified object was observed over Peoria, Illinois on 7 September 1955.
interesting points: The object was first seen as a light in the sky traveling west southwest,It was observed for approximately 15 minutes at a steady level flight at around 3000 ft altitude,The object rotated once during flight and approached within 4 miles,The sighting began at 2010 PM and ended at 2025 PM,The object was noted to be an unusually ice blue color with no known aircraft present.
witness description: Witness reported a light in the sky and described the object as unusually ice blue.
